text: The Hôtel Marcel Dassault is a hôtel particulier in Paris, France. ==Location== It is located at 7 Rond-point des Champs-Elysées in the 8th arrondissement of Paris.Le Figaro: Hotel Dassault ==History== It was built in 1844.Artcurial: Hotel Dassault It was acquired by Marcel Dassault in 1952. Since 2002, it has been home to Artcurial, an auction house owned by the Dassault Group.Dassault Group: Artcurial ==References== Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1844 Marcel Dassault Category:Buildings and structures in the 8th arrondissement of Paris Category:Dassault family
title: Hôtel Marcel Dassault
